sections.summary: Questions regarding this RFP should be directed by e-mail only to Michael Ridley (mridley@uoguelph.ca). Bidders are asked not to contact any other member of the ODL Catalyst Team or the ODL Steering Committee.

sections.title: Appendix A:  ODL Envisioned Phases & Funding
Phase I:  Business Planning
sections.summary: Timeline: March 2003 – September 2003 Funding Requested: ~$100,000 jointly funded by stakeholder groups and the provincial government.
